item.description:
Hi all,

For those who don't have to work on the day of the Boston Marathon please join me at my condo in Brookline to watch the Boston Marathon. I live on the route so it is advice to take Public transportation if possible. I will be serving beer/wine, coffee, tea, and some breakfast items. I will be asking everyone to chip in $5.00 for the cost of food. I will be picking up the food and drinks for this event since I assume it will be crowded on the T.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: 113th Running of The Boston Marathon - Event
